screenshots.description: Salary Proration configuration modal showing month calculation method (Custom days), number of days (30.45), and the daily wage formula
Daily Wage Calculation table showing all three service types: Salary proration, EOS leave encashment, and Unpaid leave deduction with their respective formulas
End of Service Eligibility configuration modal showing the info banner 'Daily rate is configured in daily wage calculation setting' and leave type options
Unpaid Leave configuration showing the Leave pay rate section with disabled fields indicating daily wage formula is controlled by payroll settings
